content: amigurumi pumkitty pie pattern by a little love everyday this pumkitty pie pattern is written in us crochet terms and available in english free pattern is available in my website https //paintitcolorful blogspot com/2020/10/pumkitty-pie-pattern html skill level easy/ intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - double_crochet - increase - decrease - slip_stitch - working in front and back loops materials you will need - sport weight yarn in white orange and brown colour - 2 5 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 5 mm safety eyes - tapestry needle hope you will enjoy crocheting this pumkitty pie as much as i did
